title: Marc Maron
description: Samantha Bee sits down with legendary comedian and podcaster Marc Maron and talks about driving in NYC, interacting with Instagram-live fans, the process of honing jokes, and why cats are impossible to work with.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
